00010 #include <models/view.h>

00012 #include <QLabel>
00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QGridLayout>
00015 
00016 FlatViewGeneralTab::FlatViewGeneralTab(QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00017                                                                            View* view, 
00018                                                                            QWidget *parent): 
00019 QWidget(parent),
00020 view_(view), 
00021 language_(this), 
00022 languageStrict_(tr("Strict"), this),
00023 modelName_(this),
00024 fileSetRefs_(component, tr("File set references"), this) {
00025 
00026         // create the labels for user to identify the editors
00027         QLabel* languageLabel = new QLabel(tr("Language"), this);
00028         QLabel* modelLabel = new QLabel(tr("Model name"), this);
00029 
00030         QGridLayout* gridLayout = new QGridLayout();
00031         gridLayout->addWidget(languageLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00032         gridLayout->addWidget(&language_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00033         gridLayout->addWidget(&languageStrict_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00034         gridLayout->addWidget(modelLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00035         gridLayout->addWidget(&modelName_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00036 
00037         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00038         topLayout->addLayout(gridLayout);
00039         topLayout->addWidget(&fileSetRefs_, 1);
00040 
00041         restoreChanges();
00042 
00043         connect(&language_, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00044                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00045         connect(&languageStrict_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00046                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047         connect(&modelName_, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00048                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049         connect(&fileSetRefs_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00050                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051 }
00052 
00053 FlatViewGeneralTab::~FlatViewGeneralTab() {
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool FlatViewGeneralTab::isValid() const {
00057         if (language_.text().isEmpty() && languageStrict_.isChecked())
00058                 return false;
00059 
00060         return true;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void FlatViewGeneralTab::restoreChanges() {
00064 
00065         language_.setText(view_->getLanguage());
00066         languageStrict_.setChecked(view_->getLanguageStrict());
00067         modelName_.setText(view_->getModelName());
00068         fileSetRefs_.setItems(view_->getFileSetRefs());
00069 }
00070 
00071 void FlatViewGeneralTab::applyChanges() {
00072 
00073         view_->setLanguage(language_.text());
00074         view_->setLanguageStrict(languageStrict_.isChecked());
00075         view_->setModelName(modelName_.text());
00076         view_->setFileSetRefs(fileSetRefs_.items());
00077 }
